name: Rescue Planes Free
description:
Come to learn what it takes to become a true hero.
When world-famous air racer learns that his most beloved friend is out for snow skiing where he got struck in a very deadly cornice. A place where no pilot can dare to fly his plane into.
But this time it is a matter of Friends life.
Only a Hero Like you can take this challenge.
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
